channel.title: Posts on Mi Sitio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mi Sitio

item.title: Bienvenido a Hugo
item.description: Bienvenido a Hugo Features Import a HTML file and watch it magically convert to Markdown Drag and drop images (requires your Dropbox account be linked) Import and save files from GitHub, Dropbox, Google Drive and One Drive Drag and drop markdown and HTML files into Dillinger Export documents as Markdown, HTML and PDF

item.title: Mi Primer Posts
item.description: Mi Primer Post Tech Dillinger uses a number of open source projects to work properly: [AngularJS] - HTML enhanced for web apps! [Ace Editor] - awesome web-based text editor [markdown-it] - Markdown parser done right. Fast and easy to extend. [Twitter Bootstrap] - great UI boilerplate for modern web apps [node.js] - evented I/O for the backend [Express] - fast node.js network app framework [@tjholowaychuk] [Gulp] - the streaming build system Breakdance - HTML to Markdown converter [jQuery] - duh
